markdownRemark.html:
Repository configuration

The github-config.yaml file contains the details of the GitHub configuration for our organization.

This file is used by Peribolos to apply the configuration to the various repositories. Check the Peribolos documentation for more details.

Updating SIG information

Information about SIGs is sourced from the sigs.yaml file.

To generate all the SIG documentation and update the OWNERS files from the source file, use the generate-sig-files target (which is the default target) in the Makefile, e.g.:

make

(genenerate is the default target).

This uses the generator app from the Kubernetes community.

Updating labels.md

The labels.md file that documents the available labels is generated from the source labels.yaml file that is used by prow to maintain the labels on the repos.

To update the document after a change in the source, use the label_sync application with the docs action. An containerized version invocation is included in the Makefile:

make generate-dockerized
